column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: godmother. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix : <http://example.org/>.:godmother a rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:label "Godmother"@en ;  rdfs:comment "A female chosen by the parents of a child to help with the child's spiritual upbringing, in many traditions."@en .:Person a rdfs:Class ;  rdfs:subClassOf :godmother ;  rdfs:comment "Any person can be a godmother, so it's a subclass of godmother."@en .:name a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain :Person ;  rdfs:range xsd:string ;  rdfs:comment "The name of the person."@en .:isGodmotherOf a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain :Person ;  rdfs:range :Person ;  rdfs:comment "A relation indicating that a person is godmother of another person."@en.:religion a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain :Person ;  rdfs:range xsd:string ;  rdfs:comment "The religion of the person."@en . :birthdate a rdf:Property ;  rdfs:domain :Person ;  rdfs:range xsd:date ;  rdfs:comment "The date of birth of the person."@en .:Person1 a :Person ;  :name "Jane"^^xsd:string ;  :birthdate "1985-07-20"^^xsd:date ;  :religion "Christianity"^^xsd:string ;  :isGodmotherOf :Person2 .:Person2 a :Person ;  :name "Jessica"^^xsd:string ;  :birthdate "2010-11-15"^^xsd:date ;  :religion "Christianity"^^xsd:string .
